sen.j: 鷹司 信尚（たかつかさ のぶひさ、天正18年4月14日 (旧暦)（1590年5月17日） - 元和 (日本)7年11月19日 (旧暦)（1621年12月31日））は江戸時代の公卿。
sen.e: Nobuhisa TAKATSUKASA (May 17, 1590 - December 31, 1621) was a Kugyo (high court noble) during the Edo period.
sen.cmt: （日本）はwebには無いので無視しました
sen.e: Nobuhisa TAKATSUKASA (May 17, 1590 - December 31, 1621) was a Kugyo (high court noble) during the Edo period.
Nobuhisa TAKATSUKASA (May 17, 1590 - December 31, 1621) was a Kugyo (high court noble) during the Edo period.
His father was Nobufusa TAKATSUKASA.
His father was Nobufusa TAKATSUKASA.
His father was Nobufusa TAKATSUKASA.

sen.j: 母は父の継室である佐々輝子。
sen.e: His mother was Teruko SASA, the second wife of his father.
His mother was Teruko SASA, the second wife of his father.
His mother was Teruko SASA, the second wife of his father.

sen.j: 兄弟に鷹司信平、鷹司孝子、子は鷹司教平、娘（花山院定好室）。
sen.e: He had a brother, Nobuhira TAKATSUKASA and a sister, Takako TAKATSUKASA as well as a son, Norihira TAKATSUKASA and a daughter, the legal wife of Sadayoshi KAZANIN.
sen.cmt: 「花山院定好室」を（）外にしました
sen.e: He had a brother, Nobuhira TAKATSUKASA; a sister, Takako TAKATSUKASA; a son, Norihira TAKATSUKASA; and a daughter, the legal wife of Sadayoshi KAZANIN.
sen.cmt: 読みやすくするため、セミコロンを使用しました。
sen.e: He had a brother, Nobuhira TAKATSUKASA; a sister, Takako TAKATSUKASA; a son, Norihira TAKATSUKASA; and a daughter, the legal wife of Sadayoshi KAZANIN.

sen.j: 後陽成天皇第三皇女の清子内親王 (江戸時代)は室。
sen.e: The third daughter of Emperor Goyoze, Princess Sugako was his wife.
sen.cmt: （江戸時代）はwebには無いので削除しました
sen.e: The third daughter of Emperor Goyoze, Princess Sugako, was his wife.
sen.cmt: カンマが抜けています。スペースが二つ入っています。
sen.e: The third daughter of Emperor Goyoze, Princess Sugako, was his wife.
He was raised to Juichii (Junior First Rank).
He was Juichii (Junior First Rank).
sen.cmt: 不要な箇所は削除しました。
sen.e: He was Juichii (Junior First Rank).
His another name was Keikokuin.
His other name was Keikokuin.
sen.cmt: other nameの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: His other name was Keikokuin.

sen.j: 天正18年（1590年）に鷹司信房の子として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as a child of Nobufusa TAKATSUKASA in 1590.
He was born to Nobufusa TAKATSUKASA in 1590.
sen.cmt: He was born toの方が自然です。
sen.e: He was born to Nobufusa TAKATSUKASA in 1590.

He held the positions of Naidaijin (the Minister of the Interior) in 1611 and 1612, Udaijin (the Minister of the Right) from 1612 to 1614, Kanpaku (chief adviser to the Emperor) from 1612 to 1615, and Sadaijin (the Minister of the Left) from 1614 to 1620.

He served as the Naidaijin (the Minister of the Interior) from 1611 to 1612, the Udaijin (the Minister of the Right) from 1612 to 1614, the Kanpaku (chief adviser to the Emperor) from 1612 to 1615, and the Sadaijin (the Minister of the Left) from 1614 to 1620.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、一部修正しました。役職の前にはtheをつけました。
sen.e: He served as the Naidaijin (the Minister of the Interior) from 1611 to 1612, the Udaijin (the Minister of the Right) from 1612 to 1614, the Kanpaku (chief adviser to the Emperor) from 1612 to 1615, and the Sadaijin (the Minister of the Left) from 1614 to 1620.

sen.j: 従一位（慶長19年（1614年）1月5日 (旧暦)叙）。
sen.e: He was raised to Juichii on February 13, 1614.
He was promoted to Juichii on February 13, 1614.
sen.cmt: promoted toの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: He was promoted to Juichii on February 13, 1614.
He passed away in 1621.
He passed away in 1621.
He passed away in 1621.
